page.title: 13Clubs & Societies, Himbleton
page.content: There is a thriving Himbleton Cricket Club in the village , it leases the lower half of the school field from the Ecclesiastical Commissioners. The Parvillion with kitchen , bar and changing rooms was built by the members. The Club maintains 4 teams including an "Under 16" side. The local pub , the Galton Arms , supports crib , darts and dominoes clubs , whilst the Village Hall accomodates the Womens Institute , Whist Drive , Bingo , Young Farmers functions and a Table Tennis Club. Sadly the Table Tennis Club has had to be disbanded this year through lack of players.
